messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to know how many t-shirt options are currently available in your online store. Also, I have some pending orders for small t-shirts, and I want to modify all of them to be purple, same size, same v-neck style, and preferably made of polyester. Could you assist me with that?

message.content: Hello! I would like to know how many t-shirt options are currently available in your online store. Also, I have some pending orders for small t-shirts, and I want to modify all of them to be purple, same size, same v-neck style, and preferably made of polyester. Could you assist me with that?

messages.content:
{
  "message": "I can help with that — first I need to authenticate you. Please provide either your email address, or your first name, last name, and zip code so I can look up your user id. 

A few clarifying points before I proceed:
- Do you confirm the t-shirt size is "Small" for all pending orders? (You mentioned small — please confirm.)
- You asked for purple, v-neck, and preferably polyester. If a purple v-neck polyester variant is unavailable for some items, is it acceptable to pick a purple v-neck in a different material? (yes/no)

After you provide your email (or name + zip) I will:
1) Look up your account and list your pending t-shirt orders.
2) Check available purple v-neck small t-shirt variants (and whether they are polyester).
3) Show you the planned modifications for each pending order and ask for your explicit confirmation (you must reply "yes" to proceed). Note: modifying items on a pending order can only be done once per order and will change the order status to "pending (items modified)." I will not make any changes until you explicitly confirm.

Please provide your email (or name + zip) and answer the two questions above so I can continue."
}
